snippet: Keith Appling scored 14 of his 19 points in the second half to help give No. 10 Michigan State a shot to share the Big Ten title.
abstract: Michigan State defeats Wisconsin, 58-43, giving them shot to share Big Ten title in men's college basketball.
lead_paragraph: Keith Appling scored 14 of his 19 points in the second half to help give No. 10 Michigan State a shot to share the Big Ten title.

headline.seo: Michigan State Preserves Big Ten Title Hopes by Beating Wisconsin
headline.main: Michigan State Preserves Big Ten Title Hopes by Beating Wisconsin
